tr: Uzaktan bir kasırga koptu, rüzgar ağaçların tepelerini bir dalga gibi kamçıladı. Frenk çınarlarının yaprakları ters yüz oldu, gümüşi taraflarını gösterdiler. Yerde, kuru yapraklar birkaç metre uçuştu. Hafif meltemler, yeşil suyun yüzünü üstüste birkaç kere buruşturdu.
es: Se dejó oír una lejana ráfaga de viento, y el aire se movió por entre las copas de los árboles como una ola. Las hojas de sicomoro volvieron hacia arriba sus dorsos de plata; las hojas parduscas, secas, sobre la tierra, revolotearon un poco. Y pequeñas ondas surcaron, en filas sucesivas, la verde superficie del agua.
vi_translation: A gunshot echoed from afar and the wind stirred the treetops like a wave. The fig leaves shimmered in the light. On the ground, the yellow leaves were blown a few feet away. And intermittently, gentle breezes rippled the green water.
tr_translation: A hurricane broke out in the distance, the wind whipped the tops of the trees like a wave. The leaves of the plane trees turned inside out, showing their silvery sides. On the ground, dry leaves flew a few meters. Gentle breezes crumpled the surface of the green water several times.
es_translation: A distant gust of wind was heard, and the air moved through the treetops like a wave. The sycamore leaves turned their silver undersides upwards; the brown, dry leaves on the ground fluttered a bit. And small waves rippled, in successive rows, across the green surface of the water.

en: When he was finished, he sat down on the bank, with his side to the pool, so that he could watch the trail’s entrance. He embraced his knees and laid his chin down on his knees.
vi: Uống rồi, nó ngồi xuống bờ, ngồi chéo để có thể coi chừng con đường nhỏ đi vào. Nó co đầu gối vào trong hai tay và tì cằm lên đầu gối.
tr: İşi bitince, yol boyunu gözetleyebilmek için dere kenarına yanlamasına oturdu. Dizlerini iki eliyle kavrayarak çenesini dizlerine dayadı.
es: Cuando hubo terminado, se sentó en la orilla, dando el costado a la laguna de manera que pudiera vigilar la entrada del sendero. Se abrazó las rodillas y en ellas apoyó el mentón.
vi_translation: After drinking, he sat down on the bank, sitting cross-legged so he could watch the small path leading in. He pulled his knees into his hands and rested his chin on his knees.
tr_translation: After finishing the work, he sat sideways by the creek to watch the road. He grasped his knees with both hands and rested his chin on them.
es_translation: When he had finished, he sat on the shore, turning his side to the lagoon so that he could watch the entrance of the path. He hugged his knees and rested his chin on them.

en: But the rabbit repeated softly over and over, “He gonna leave you, ya crazy bastard. He gonna leave ya all alone. He gonna leave ya, crazy bastard.”
vi: Nhưng con thỏ vẫn lập lại hoài, giọng nhỏ nhẹ: - Bác ấy sẽ bỏ mặc mày, đồ chết bằm! Bác bỏ mày bơ vơ một mình. Bác ấy bỏ mặc mày, đồ chết tiệt!
tr: Ama tavşan usulca hep aynı sözü tekrarlıyordu: "Seni bırakıp gidecek, koca dangalak. Seni bırakıp gidecek, koca dangalak.
es: Pero el conejo repitió con suavidad, una y otra vez: —Te va a dejar solo, chiflado. Te va a dejar solo. Te va a dejar, chiflado.
vi_translation: But the rabbit kept repeating softly: - He will abandon you, you wretched thing! He will leave you all alone. He will abandon you, you damn thing!
tr_translation: But the rabbit was softly repeating the same phrase over and over: "He will leave you, big idiot. He will leave you, big idiot."
es_translation: But the rabbit softly repeated, again and again: —She's going to leave you alone, crazy. She's going to leave you alone. She's going to leave you, crazy.

en: The little evening breeze blew over the clearing and the leaves rustled and the wind waves flowed up the green pool. And the shouts of men sounded again, this time much closer than before.
vi: Gió chiều thổi nhẹ trên khu rừng thưa gợn lướt trên mặt nước xanh thẳm. Và lại vẳng có tiếng người kêu, lần này thì gần hơn.
tr: Akşam meltemi düzlüğün üzerinden hafifçe esti, yeşil sular ürperdi. Adamların sesleri bu sefer çok daha yakından duyuldu.
es: La escasa brisa del atardecer sopló sobre el claro y las hojas susurraron y las pequeñas olas surcaron la verde laguna. Y los gritos de los hombres resonaron nuevamente, esta vez mucho más cerca que antes.
vi_translation: The evening breeze gently blows through the sparse forest, rippling across the deep blue water. And again, there was the sound of someone calling, this time closer.
tr_translation: The evening breeze gently blew over the plain, the green waters shivered. The voices of the men were heard much closer this time.
es_translation: The scant evening breeze blew over the clearing, and the leaves whispered and the small waves rippled across the green lagoon. And the shouts of the men echoed again, this time much closer than before.

en: “You … an’ me. Ever’body gonna be nice to you. Ain’t gonna be no more trouble. Nobody gonna hurt nobody nor steal from ’em.”
vi: - Ờ hai anh em mình. Rồi mọi người đều tử tế với mày. Mình sẽ không còn bị rắc rối nữa. Mình rồi không làm phiền nhiễu ai cả, không trộm cắp gì ai cả.
tr: "İkimiz. Herkes sana iyi davranacak. Başımızı derde sokmayacağız. Kimseye bir fenalığımız dokunmayacak, kimsenin malını çalmayacağız.
es: —Tú... y yo. Todos van a ser buenos contigo. No van a haber más líos. Nadie va a hacer daño a los demás ni a robarles.
vi_translation: - Just the two of us. Then everyone will be kind to you. We won't have any more trouble. We won't bother anyone, we won't steal from anyone.
tr_translation: "The two of us. Everyone will treat you well. We won't get into trouble. We won't harm anyone, we won't steal anyone's property."
es_translation: —You... and I. Everyone is going to be good to you. There won't be any more trouble. Nobody is going to hurt others or steal from them.
